name: Slip and Tear
description:
This game was created in 5 days for the Jame Gam #25.

In Slip and Tear you are defending yourself from monsters that want to corrupt and kill you. And all you have is a knife. Well that and their corpses, upon which you can slip and fall and kill other monsters with. 

YOU SLIP IN THE DIRECTION YOUR CURSOR IS

WASD TO MOVE

SPACEBAR OR LEFT CLICK TO ATTACK
